sentences.en: But, if PSC is censorial derelict, unreasonable, ship - owner also can maintain his interest through legal measure.
sentences.cn: 但是, 假如PSC检查官玩忽职守 、 不讲道理, 船东也可以通过法律手段维护自己的利益.

sentences.en: Derelict inner - city sites could be sold off cheaply for housing.
sentences.cn: 荒废的内城区可以廉价出售用来修建房屋.

sentences.en: Doors of derelict houses may be boarded and nailed up to prevent children from getting in.
sentences.cn: 无人居住的房子,可以用木板把门户钉起来,以防止小孩进入.

sentences.en: Had it afoul of an underwater rock or the wreckage of some enormous derelict ship?
sentences.cn: 它是撞上了暗礁呢,还是撞上了一只沉没的破船?

sentences.en: Her body was found dumped in a derelict warehouse less than a mile from her home.
sentences.cn: 在距离她家不到一英里的一座废弃仓库里发现了她遭弃的尸体。

sentences.en: I'm detached and moving toward the derelict spacecraft.
sentences.cn: 我准备脱离并前往被遗弃的太空船.

sentences.en: Last night I realized that I'd been both blind and derelict.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上我才发现自己既失职又有眼不识泰山.

sentences.en: Most of the five - storey building is dusty derelict.
sentences.cn: 这个五层楼的工厂早已被弃置,因而灰尘密布.

sentences.en: Most of the interesting murderers come from derelict farms.
sentences.cn: 大多数变态的杀人王都出自于废弃的农场.
四十一号则好象被人弃置.

sentences.en: Several derelict cars are fished out of the canal every month.
sentences.cn: 每月都从运河里捞出几辆弃旧汽车.

sentences.en: The burying - ground is merely a huge waste of hummocky ( hilly ) earth , like a derelict ( deserted ) building - lot.
sentences.cn: 坟场只不过是一片 土丘 林立的荒野, 恰似一片已废弃不用的建筑场地.

sentences.en: The derelict soldier shirked his duties.
sentences.cn: 这名疏忽的士兵推卸了他的责任.

sentences.en: These derelict houses are a reproach to the city.
sentences.cn: 这些弃置的破房是本市的耻辱.

words.tran_cn: 玩忽职守的；无主的；被抛弃了的
遗弃物；玩忽职守者；被遗弃的人

trans.tran_cn: 被抛弃的，废弃的，玩忽职守的
trans.tran_en: A place or building that is derelict is empty and in a bad state of repair because it has not been used or lived in for a long time
someone who has no money or home, lives on the streets, and is very dirty – used to show disapproval
